item.description: http://www.facebook.c... PROBLEM: incumbent warmonger-in-chief democrat SOLUTION: antiwar republican challenger Join us at noon on the Boston Common to protest 10 years of wars/occupations and to persuade the antiwar lefties [not necessarily to change political affiliation but] to vote for Ron and vote for peace! I expect many of these people voted for and now regret voting for Obomba. Bring signs if you got 'em. If you don't have any then come anyways and will give you one or give you cards to hand out more info about the protest http://www.facebook.c...
item.name: Blue Republican outreach at Boston Antiwar Rally
